content: फल्गु {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [फल् --उ गुक् च <ls>Uṇ. 1. 18</ls>] {@--1@} Pithless, unessential; unsubstantial; सारं ततो ग्राह्यमपास्य फल्गु <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Worthless, useless, unimportant; <ls>Śi. 3. 76.</ls> {@--3@} Small, minute. {@--4@} Vain, unmeaning. {@--5@} Weak, feeble, flimsy. {@--6@} Untrue. {@--7@} Beautiful, lovely. --ल्गुः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} The spring season. {@--2@} The opposite-leaved fig-tree. {@--3@} <ab>N.</ab> of a river at Gayā. {@--4@} A red powder of wild ginger (<ab>Mar.</ab> गुलाल) thrown by the Hindus over one another at the Holi festival.
